channel.title: Almost done portforwardding
channel.description:
Hi guys. I have been working on portforwarding for a while now, and I actually reached somewhere. But theres a problem
So, I used the port checker from portforward.com and it says that my port is open, although when I post my server on google, I get this message: We could not connect to your server. Are you sure it's online, and that you are not blocking connections from 217.23.15.196 ?
Ok, and I also when to canyouseeme.org, I checked port 43594 and it's wrong. The reason it says is: connection refused. I don't get it, the port checker tool works, and seeme.org doesnt. Even google doesn't work for me.
This is what I do. My server is called usmanpkz.no-ip.biz I portforwarded pretty much like 200 times. Now I got the port checking tool saying: your port is open! But the downsides are that canyouseeme.org says that my connection is refused. and google just gives a stupid message: We could not connect to your server. Are you sure it's online, and that you are not blocking connections from 217.23.15.196 ?
Any help is appreciated for rep+ :)
EDIT:
alright, now it's getting even more wierd, when I click check port in port checker, it randomly either says your port is open, or your port is not open, or is unreachable WTF??

item.title: Almost done portforwardding
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

im not blocking my Ipv4 address, that “blocked thing” is my pc’s name lol.
I don’t really know if it’s safe to put it in public

whatever, my friend will do it for me…

Read full topic

item.title: Almost done portforwardding
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I think its kinda funny that your blocking out a simple IPv4 address… I’m at least hoping that’s your IPv4, but if it isn’t thats your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Almost done portforwardding
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

k, I’ll give it a try again.
ok does anyone think this has any problems?

NewBitmapImage7-1.jpg792×528

i set udp and tcp both to 43594, i updated my router, i get no errors except for a torrent trial version advertisement, it succesfully ports it, but no difference.

Read full topic

Well forget the port checker tool, its inaccurate. Keep playing around with your router, there’s only so much you can do to it.
